Potions can be crafted anywhere, it's not necessary to be at camp or at any special potion station. To access the crafting interface, you can select the third tab with an icon of a potion of your inventory menu or press "H" button when no menu is currently displayed.

Potions and Elixirs can be crafted with 2 reagents, but you may need to previously craft those reagents with other recipees and other reagents too.
